title: Althea Marks
text: I am a perpetual learner driven by curiosity. I find solace while climbing up snow-covered ridges, however, my most rewarding work is using data and technology to assemble a planet where humans and ecosystems thrive. Genuine interpersonal communication and a dose of levity is key while learning from others and my own mistakes.

title: Native Olympia Oyster Collaborative Synthesis
text:
Overview
As the Database Analyst for NOOC (Native Olympia Oyster Collaborative), I built an online data collection survey (Qualtrics) and created a database of all Olympia oyster restoration projects. This required partnering with 23 government, non-profit, and academic organizations and working closely with the NOOC core team. I needed to tailor my communication style with different organization to convey the project goals and importance. I build data visualizations (Figure 2) and maps (Figure 1) for the peer-reviewed paper and assisted with analyses.

title: scythe Package Development

Analysis
